Title: Relates to exceptions to endangering the welfare of a child and unsupervised children
Summary: Establishes that the parent or guardian of a child shall be able to permit such child to engage in certain unsupervised acts without such parent being subject to penalty or such child being designated as a "neglected child".
LawCode: Amd ยง260.10, Pen L; amd ยง1012, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to exceptions to endangering the welfare of a child; and to amend the family court act, in relation to unsupervised children age ten or older
